comment: If in a context ` x ` is not free in ` ps ` and ` ch ` , then it is not free in ` ( ps -> ch ) ` . Deduction form of ~ nfim . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Dec-2017.) ~ df-nf changed. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 18-Sep-2021.) Eliminate curried form of ~ nfimt . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jul-2022.)
